summary: Adds a player owned container to Riverwood
descriptionHtml:
Note: The pictures on Nexus show up as pictures of oil for me until you open them.
Places a player owned barrel behind Hod and Gerdur\\\'s House in Riverwood.
  Very small mod. Allows a player to store some items before buying a house.

Lore: Player finds empty barrel. Player uses empty barrel to store stuff.

Future
- Add a quest to gain ownership of the container
-- replace Barrel with Chest
- Possibly add more chests to other cities.

If it doesn\'t work let me know. First Skyrim mod.

Will gladly accept advice and CONSTRUCTIVE criticism.

http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=88359950&searchtext=starter+container
author: Delta1196
